00064 TestNode::TestNode()
00065 {
00066     nodeVertexSet = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->newVertexSet();
00067     nodeVertexSet->setVertices(Verts, 12);
00068     nodeVertexSet->setTextureCoordinates(TexCoords, 12);
00069     nodeVertexSet->setNormals(Normals, 12);
00070 
00071     nodeTexture = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getTextureMonitor()->getTexture("Data/backgrounds/background_2.tga");
00072 
00073     //TODO: Check before typecast
00074     File* shdFile = (File*) Filesystem::evaluateChild(Filesystem::getRoot(), "Data/Shaders/Test.shader");
00075     nodeShader = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->getShaderFactory()->loadShader(shdFile);
00076 
00077     printf("Compiling shader\n");
00078

00080     {
00081

00083         nodeShader->setTextureName(0, "texture");
00084 
00085     }

00088

00109 void TestNode::draw(Camera* cam)
00110 {
00111 
00112     if (nodeShader != 0)
00113     {
00114 
00115         nodeShader->activateShader();
00116         nodeShader->setTexture(0, nodeTexture);
00117 
00118     }
00119 
00120     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->pushMatrix();
00121 
00122     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_AMBIENT, LightAmbient);                             // Setup The Ambient Light
00123     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, LightDiffuse);                             // Setup The Diffuse Light
00124     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION,LightPosition);                    // Position The Light
00125 
00126     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->translateMatrix(m_position.getX(), m_position.getY(), m_position.getZ());
00127     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->rotateMatrix(m_rotation.getX(), m_rotation.getY(), m_rotation.getZ());
00128 
00129     glScalef(10.0f, 10.0f, 10.0f);
00130 
00131         nodeVertexSet->Draw();
00132 
00133     glScalef(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);
00134 
00135     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->popMatrix();
00136 
00137     if (nodeShader != 0)
00138         nodeShader->deactivateShader();
00139 
00140 }

00147 static float vectorLength(float* vector)
00148 {
00149     return sqrtf((vector[0] * vector[0]) + (vector[1] * vector[1]) * (vector[2] * vector[2]));
00150 }
00151 
00152 static void vectorNormalize(float* vector)
00153 {
00154     float length = vectorLength(vector);
00155     if (length == 0) length = 1;
00156 
00157     vector[0] = vector[0] / length;
00158     vector[1] = vector[1] / length;
00159     vector[2] = vector[2] / length;
00160 }
00161 
00162 static void vectorBetween(float* start, float* other, float* result)
00163 {
00164     result[0] = other[0] - start[0];
00165     result[1] = other[1] - start[1];
00166     result[2] = other[2] - start[2];
00167 }
00168 
00169 static void vectorCross(float* first, float* other, float* result)
00170 {
00171 
00172     result[0] = (first[1] * other[2]) - (first[2] * other[1]);
00173     result[1] = (first[2] * other[0]) - (first[0] * other[2]);
00174     result[2] = (first[0] * other[1]) - (first[1] * other[0]);
00175 
00176 }
00177 
00178 static void vectorCopy(float* out, unsigned int outStart, float* in, unsigned int inStart)
00179 {
00180     out[outStart] = in[inStart];
00181     out[outStart + 1] = in[inStart + 1];
00182     out[outStart + 2] = in[inStart + 2];
00183 }
00184 
00185 static void vectorAdd(float* out, unsigned int start, float* in)
00186 {
00187     out[start] += in[0];
00188     out[start + 1] += in[1];
00189     out[start + 2] += in[2];
00190 }

00192 const unsigned int mainChunk = 0x4d4d;
00193 const unsigned int editorChunk = 0x3d3d;
00194 const unsigned int editObjectChunk = 0x4000;
00195 const unsigned int objectTriangleMesh = 0x4100;
00196 const unsigned int objectVertexList = 0x4110;
00197 const unsigned int objectFaceList = 0x4120;
00198 const unsigned int objectUVList = 0x4140;

00201 bool TestNode::load(const char* Filename)
00202 {
00203     FILE* fin = fopen(Filename, "rb");
00204 
00205     if (fin == 0)
00206     {
00207         printf("Could not open %s for reading in binary mode\n", Filename);
00208         return false;
00209     }
00210 
00211     bool result = true;
00212 
00213     float* vertices = 0;
00214     float* normals = 0;
00215     unsigned int numVertices = 0;
00216 
00217     float* uvCoordinates = 0;
00218     unsigned int numUVCoordinates = 0;
00219 
00220     unsigned int* indices = 0;
00221     unsigned int numPolygons = 0;
00222 
00223     unsigned short chunkID = 0;
00224     unsigned int chunkLength = 0;
00225 
00226     unsigned char tempChar = 0;
00227 
00228     unsigned short faceFlags = 0;
00229 
00230     while (true)
00231     {
00232 
00233         fread(&chunkID, 2, 1, fin);
00234         fread(&chunkLength, 4, 1, fin);
00235 
00236         if (feof(fin) || ferror(fin))
00237         {
00238             printf("End of file or read error\n");
00239             break;
00240         }
00241 
00242         switch (chunkID)
00243         {
00244             case mainChunk:
00245             {
00246                 printf("Main chunk, ID: 0x%x Length 0x%x\n", chunkID, chunkLength);
00247                 break;
00248             };
00249 
00250             case editorChunk:
00251             {
00252                 printf("Editor chunk, ID: 0x%x Length 0x%x\n", chunkID, chunkLength);
00253                 break;
00254             };
00255 
00256             case editObjectChunk:
00257             {
00258 
00259                 printf("Edit object chunk, ID: 0x%x Length 0x%x\n", chunkID, chunkLength);
00260 
00261                 //Store the start of the name so we can seek back to it
00262                 unsigned long currentPosition = ftell(fin);
00263                 unsigned int nameLength = 0;
00264 
00265                 while (true)
00266                 {
00267                     fread(&tempChar, 1, 1, fin);
00268 
00269                     if (feof(fin) || ferror(fin))
00270                     {
00271                         //Shouldn't end here, Flag a error and run
00272                         result = false;
00273                         break;
00274                     }
00275 
00276                     if (tempChar == '\0')
00277                         break;
00278 
00279                     nameLength++;
00280                 }
00281 
00282                 //Break out of the switch if result is bad
00283                 if (result == false) break;
00284 
00285                 //Otherwise allocate space for  the name, seek to the start and read it again
00286 
00287                 printf("Name length %i\n", nameLength);
00288 
00289                 //Add one byte for a null terminator
00290                 char* nameData = new char[nameLength + 1];
00291 
00292                 fseek(fin, currentPosition, SEEK_SET);
00293                 fread(nameData, 1, nameLength + 1, fin);
00294 
00295                 printf("Read name %s\n", nameData);
00296 
00297                 nodeName = nameData;
00298 
00299                 break;
00300             };
00301 
00302             case objectTriangleMesh:
00303             {
00304                 printf("Triangle mesh node ID: %i length %i\n", chunkID, chunkLength);
00305                 break;
00306             };
00307 
00308             case objectVertexList:
00309             {
00310                 printf("Vertex list ID %i length %i\n", chunkID, chunkLength);
00311 
00312                 numVertices = 0;
00313                 fread(&numVertices, 2, 1, fin);
00314 
00315                 printf("Num vertices %i\n", numVertices);
00316 
00317                 vertices = new float[numVertices * 3];
00318                 memset(vertices, 0, sizeof(float) * numVertices * 3);
00319 
00320                 if (fread(vertices, sizeof(float), numVertices * 3, fin) != numVertices * 3)
00321                 {
00322                     printf("Unable to read vertices\n");
00323                     result = false;
00324                     break;
00325                 }
00326 
00327                 break;
00328             };
00329 
00330             case objectFaceList:
00331             {
00332                 printf("Face list ID: %i length %i\n", chunkID, chunkLength);
00333 
00334                 numPolygons= 0;
00335                 fread(&numPolygons, 2, 1, fin);
00336 
00337                 printf("Num indices %i\n", numPolygons * 3);
00338 
00339                 indices = new unsigned int[numPolygons * 3];
00340                 memset(indices, 0, sizeof(int) * numPolygons * 3);
00341 
00342                 short tempIndices[3];
00343                 unsigned int cIndPtr = 0;
00344 
00345 
00346                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numPolygons; i++)
00347                 {
00348                     memset(tempIndices, 0, sizeof(short) * 3);
00349 
00350                     if (fread(tempIndices, 2, 3, fin) != 3)
00351                     {
00352                         result = false;
00353                         break;
00354                     }
00355 
00356                     if (fread(&faceFlags, 2, 1, fin) != 1)
00357                     {
00358                         result = false;
00359                         break;
00360                     }
00361 
00362                     indices[cIndPtr] = tempIndices[0];
00363                     cIndPtr++;
00364                     indices[cIndPtr] = tempIndices[1];
00365                     cIndPtr++;
00366                     indices[cIndPtr] = tempIndices[2];
00367                     cIndPtr++;
00368                 }
00369 
00370                 break;
00371             };
00372 
00373             case objectUVList:
00374             {
00375                 printf("UV list ID: %i length %i\n", chunkID, chunkLength);
00376 
00377                 fread(&numUVCoordinates, 2, 1, fin);
00378 
00379                 uvCoordinates = new float[numUVCoordinates * 2];
00380 
00381                 if (fread(uvCoordinates, sizeof(float), numUVCoordinates * 2, fin) != numUVCoordinates * 2)
00382                 {
00383                     printf("Unable to read UV coordinates\n");
00384                     result = false;
00385                 }
00386 
00387                 break;
00388             };
00389 
00390 
00391             default:
00392             {
00393                 printf("Unhandled chunk ID: 0x%x Length: 0x%x skipping\n", chunkID, chunkLength);
00394 
00395                 //Skip length - 6 (6 is the size of the header) bytes
00396                 fseek(fin, chunkLength - 6, SEEK_CUR);
00397 
00398                 break;
00399             };
00400 
00401         };
00402 
00403         if (result == false)
00404         {
00405             //If result is false, then a error occured in the switch statement so bottle out
00406             break;
00407         }
00408     }
00409 
00410     /* COMPUTE THE NORMALS */
00411     if (vertices != 0)
00412     {
00413         normals = new float[numVertices * 3];
00414         memset(normals, 0, sizeof(float) * numVertices * 3);
00415         unsigned int* numConnections = new unsigned int[numVertices];
00416 
00417         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numVertices; ++i)
00418         {
00419             numConnections[i] = 0;
00420         }
00421 
00422         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numVertices; ++i)
00423         {
00424             normals[i] = 0;
00425         }
00426 
00427         float vec1[3];
00428         float vec2[3];
00429         float vec3[3];
00430 
00431         float vecb1[3];
00432         float vecb2[3];
00433 
00434         float calculatedNormal[3];
00435 
00436         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numPolygons * 3; i += 3)
00437         {
00438             unsigned int vertexOne = indices[i];
00439             unsigned int vertexTwo = indices[i + 1];
00440             unsigned int vertexThree = indices[i + 2];
00441 
00442             //printf("0x%x 0x%x 0x%x\n", vectorOnePointer, vectorTwoPointer, vectorThreePointer);
00443             vectorCopy(vec1, 0, vertices, vertexOne * 3);
00444             vectorCopy(vec2, 0, vertices, vertexTwo * 3);
00445             vectorCopy(vec3, 0, vertices, vertexThree * 3);
00446 
00447             //Get the vector from vec1 to vec2 (Vec2 - Vec1)
00448             vectorBetween(vec1, vec2, vecb1);
00449 
00450             //Get the vector from vec1 to vec3 (Vec3 - Vec1)
00451             vectorBetween(vec1, vec3, vecb2);
00452 
00453             //Normalize the results
00454             vectorNormalize(vecb2);
00455             vectorNormalize(vecb1);
00456 
00457             //Get the cross product of the two vectors
00458             vectorCross(vecb1, vecb2, calculatedNormal);
00459 
00460             //Normalize it
00461             vectorNormalize(calculatedNormal);
00462 
00463             numConnections[ vertexOne ] += 1;
00464             numConnections[ vertexTwo ] += 1;
00465             numConnections[ vertexThree ] += 1;
00466 
00467             //printf("between %f %f %f\n%f %f %f\nnormal %f %f %f\n", vecb1[0], vecb1[1], vecb1[2], vecb2[0], vecb2[1], vecb2[2], normal[0], normal[1], normal[2]);
00468 
00469             //Add it to each vertex normal shared by this poly
00470             vectorAdd(normals, vertexOne * 3, calculatedNormal);
00471             vectorAdd(normals, vertexTwo * 3, calculatedNormal);
00472             vectorAdd(normals, vertexThree * 3, calculatedNormal);
00473         }
00474 
00475         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numVertices; ++i)
00476         {
00477 
00478             if (numConnections[i] > 0)
00479             {
00480                 normals[(i * 3) ] = normals[( i * 3)] / numConnections[i];
00481                 normals[(i * 3) + 1] = normals[( i * 3) + 1] / numConnections[i];
00482                 normals[(i * 3) + 2] = normals[( i * 3) + 2] / numConnections[i];
00483             }
00484 
00485         }
00486 
00487         delete[] numConnections;
00488     }
00489 
00490     if (result == true)
00491     {
00492         nodeVertexSet->setIndices(indices, numPolygons * 3);
00493         nodeVertexSet->setVertices(vertices, numVertices);
00494         nodeVertexSet->setNormals(normals, numVertices);
00495         nodeVertexSet->setTextureCoordinates(uvCoordinates, numUVCoordinates);
00496     }
00497 
00498     delete[] indices;
00499     delete[] normals;
00500     delete[] vertices;
00501     delete[] uvCoordinates;
00502 
00503     fclose(fin);
00504     return result;
00505 }
